items.sawal: Wuzu karne ka Tariqa kia hai?
items.jawab:
Wuzu karne ka Tariqa ye hai ki 
 - Pahle bismillahir rahmanir rahim(بسم اللہ الرحمن الرحیم)padhe. 
 - Fir miswak kare, miswak na ho to ungli se daant meil le
 - Fir dono haaton ko gatto tak tin baar dhoe. Pahle dahne haath par paani daale fir baaein haath par. dono ko ek sath na dhoe. 
 - Fir dahne haath dahne haath se tin baar kulli kare. 
 - Fir baaien haath ki choti ungli naak saaf kare. aur dahne haath se tin baar naak me paani chadhae. 
 - Fir pura chahra dhoe. yani Peshani par bal ugne ki jagah se thodhi ke niche tak aur ek kaan ki lo se dusre kaan ki lo tak har hisse par tin baar pani bahaye. 
 - Iss ke baad dono haath kauhnion samet tin baar dhoe. Unglion ki taraf se kauhnion ke upar tak paani dale. Kahnion ki taraf se na dale.
 - Fir ek baar dono haath se pure sar ka masah kare fir kaano ka aur gardan ka ek ek baar masah kare.
 - Fir dono paaon takhno samet tin baar dhoe.

items.sawal: Dhone ka matlab kya hai?
items.jawab: Dhone ka matlab ye hai ki jis cheez dhoe uss ke har hisse par paani bah jaaye.

items.sawal: Agar kuch hissa bhig gaya magar uss par paani nahi baha to wuzu hoga ya nahi?
items.jawab: Iss tarah wuzu hargiz na hoga, bhigne ke sath har hisse par paani bah jana zaruri hai.

items.sawal: Wuzu me kitne chize farz hai?
items.jawab:
Wuzu me char(four) cheeze farz hai. 
		 1. Awwal munh dhona yaani baal nikalne ki jagah se thodi ke niche tak aur ek kaan ke lo se dusre kaan ke lo tak. 
		 2. Kauhnia samet dono haath dhona. 
		 3. Chauthayi(1/4 hissa) sar masah karna, yaani bhiga hua haath ferna. 
		 4. Dono paaon takhno samet dhona

items.sawal: Wuzu me kitne sunnate hai?
items.jawab:
Wuzu me sunnate 16 hai. 
		 1. Niyyat karna 
		 2. Bismillahir rahmanir rahim(بسم اللہ الرحمن الرحیم) se suru karna 
		 3. Dono haatho ko gatto tak tin baar dhona,  
		 4. Miswak karna 
		 5. Dahne haat se tin bar kullian karna 
		 6. Dahne haath ne tin baar naak me paani chadhana. 
		 7. Baaien haath se naak saf karna 
		 8. Daardhi ka khilal karna 
		 9. Haath paaon ki unglion ka khilal karna 
		 10. Har aaza ko tin baar dhona 
		 11. Pura sar ka ek baar masah karna 
		 12. Kaanon ka masah karna. 
		 13. Tartib se wuzu karna 
		 14. Dadhi ke jo baal munh ke daire ke niche hai un ka masah karna  
		 15. Aaza ko pe dar pe dhona  
		 16. Har makruhaat se bachna

items.sawal: Wuzu me kitni baate makruh hai?
items.jawab:
Wuzu me 21 baatei makruh hai: 
		 1. Aurat ke ghusal ya wuzu ke bache hue paani se wuzu karna. 
		 2. Wuzu ke lie najis jagah baithna.
		 3. Najis jagah wuzu ke paani girana. 
		 4. Masjid ke andar wuzu karna. 
		 5. Wuzu ke aaza se bartan me paani ke qatre tapkana 
		 6. Paani me rainth ya khankar dalna. 
		 7. Qiblah ki taraf thuk ya khankar dalna ya kulli karna 
		 8. Be zarurat dunia ki baat karna. 
		 9. Zarurat se jyada paani kharch karna. 
		 10. Paani iss qadar kam kharch ki sunnat ada na ho. 
		 11. Munh par paani marna. 
		 12. Munh par paani dalte waqat phunkna. 
		 13. Sirf ek haath se munh dhona. 
		 14. Gale ka masah karna. 
		 15. Baaein haath se kulli karna ya naak me paani dalna. 
		 16. Dahne haath se naak saf karna. 
		 17. Apne lie koi lota wageirah khas kar lena. 
		 18. Tin naye paani se tin baar sar ka masah karna. 
		 19. Jis kapdhe se istinja ka paani khusk kia ho usse aazaye wuzu pochna. 
		 20. Dhup ke garam paani se wuzu karna. 
		 21. Kisi sunnat ko chhodh dena.

items.sawal: Kin Cheezon se wuzu tut jata hai?
items.jawab:
Jin baaton se wuzu tut jata hai wo ye hai: 
		 - Pakhana ya peshab karna. 
		 - Pakhana peshab ki raste se kisi aur cheez ka nikalna. 
		 - Pakhane ke raste se hawa ka nikalna. 
		 - Badan ke kisi maqam se khun ya peep nikal kar aisi jagah bahna ki jis ka wuzu ya gusal me dhona farz hai. 
		 - Khana, pani ya safara ki munh bhar qay ana. 
		 - Iss tarah so jana ki jisam ke jodh dhile padh jaye. 
		 - Behosh hona. 
		 - Junun hona. 
		 - Ghashi hona. 
		 - Kisi cheez ka itna nasha hona ki chlne me paon ladkhadae. 
		 - Ruku aur sajdah wali namaz mei itni zor se hansna ki aas paas wale sune. 
		 - Dukhti aankh se aansu bahna.

items.sawal: Kin surton mei ghusal karna farz hai?
items.jawab:
1. Mani ka apni jagah se shohobat ke sath juda ho kar aaza(sharm gah) se nikalna. 
	2. Ehtelaam 
	3. Hashfah yaani sar zakar(sharam gah) ka aurat ke aage ya piche ya mard ke piche dakhil hona dono par ghusal farz karta hai. 
	4. Haiz se faarig hona. 
	5. Nifaas ka khatam hona.

items.sawal: Ghusal mei kinti baatei farz hai?
items.jawab:
Ghusal me tin baatei farz hai- 
		1. Kulli karna. 
		2. Naak me paani dalna. 
	 3. Tamaam Zahiri badan par sar se paaon tak paani bahana

items.sawal: Ghusal karne ka Triqah kia hai?
items.jawab:
Ghusal karne ka Tariqah yeh hai ki pahle ghusal ki niyyat kar ke dono haat gatto tak tin baar dhoe. Fir istinja ki jagah dhoe. Uss ke baad badan par agar kahi najasat haqiqi yaani peshab ya pakhana wageirah ho to use dur kare. Fir namaaz jaisa wuzu kare magar paon na dhoe. Haan agar chauki(chair) ya patthar wageirah unchi cheez par nahaye to paaon bhi dho le. 
 Iss ke baad badan par tel(oil) ki tarah paani chadhaye. Fir tin baar daine kandhe(right shoulder) paani bahaye, aur fir tin bar baayen kandhe(left shoulder) par, fir sar par. 
 Aur tamaam badan par tin baar paani bahaye. Tamaam badan par hath phere aur mal-le(rubbing). Phir nahane ke baad fauran kapdhe pahenle.

items.sawal: Ghusal mei kitni baatei sunnat hai?
items.jawab:
Ghusal mei ye baatei sunnat hai: 
 1: Ghusal ki niyyat karna, 
2: Dono hathon ko gatto tak tin baar dhona. 
3: Istinja ki jagah dhona. 
4: Badan par jahan kahi najaasat ho use dur karna. 
5: Namaaz jaisa wuzu karna, 
6: Badan par teil ki tarah paani chadhana. 
7: Daine maudhe fir baaien maudhe fir sar par aur tamaam badan par tin baar paani bahana. 
8: Tamaam badan par haath pherna aur meilna(rubbing) 
9: Nahane me qiblah rukh na hona. Aur kapdha pahan kar nahata ho to koi harj nahi. 
10: Aisi jagah nahana ki koi na dekhe. 
11: nahate waqat kisi qisam ka kalam na ka karna. 
12: Koi dua na padhna. 
13: Auraton ko baith kar nahana. 
14: Nahane k baad fauran kapdha pahen lena.

items.sawal: Kin waqton me ghusal karna sunnat hai?
items.jawab: Juma, Eid, Baqara eid, Aarafa ke din, aur ahraam bandhte waqt

items.sawal: Kin Surton me ghusal karna mustahab hai?
items.jawab:
Waquf e aarafa, Waquf e muzdalfa, Hazir e haram, Hazir e sarkare do aalam (صلی اللہ تعالی علیہ وسلم), Tawaf, dakhil e Mina tino jamron par kankaria marne ke lie. Shab e barat, Shab e qadar, aarafah ki raat, Majlis e milaad sharif, aur digar majlis khair ki haŻiri ke lie, Murdah nahlane ke baad, Majnun ko junun jane ke baad, ghashi se afaqah ke baad, nasha jaate rahne ke baad, gunahon se tauba karne ke lie, naya kapdha pahenne ke lie, safar se wapis ke baad, istehaza bandh hone ke baad, namaaz kasuf khusuf, istasqa, khauf, taariki aur sakht andhi ke lie, badan par najasat lagi ho aur ye na malum ho ki kis jagah hai.
 - In sab surton me ghusal karna mustahab hai.
	. NB: 1. Ghutna khol kar logon ke saamne nahaana sakht gunah aur haraam hai. 
	2. Najis kapdha pahenkar ghusal na kare. Aur agar dusra paak kapdha na ho to usiko paak karle.

items.sawal: Namaaz ki sharait kitni hai?
items.jawab:
Namaaz ki sharait 6 hai, jin ke baghair namaaz suru hoti hi nahi. Aur wo ye hai:
		 1. Taharat
		 2. Satre Aurat
		 3. Isteqbaal e Qibla
		 4. Waqat
		 5. Niyyat
		 6. Takbir e tahrima

		 1. Taharat- Yani namaazi ke badan, kapdhe aur uss jagah ka paak hona chahie jis par namaaz padhe.
		 2. Satre aurat- Yani mard ko naaf se ghutne tak chhupana aur aurat ko siwa chahra, hathli aur qadam ke pura badan chhupana. Aurat agar itna baarik dopatta odh kar namaaz padhe ki jis se baal ki siyahi chamke to namaaz na hogi, jab tak ki uss par koi aisi cheez na odhe ki jis se baal ka rang chhup jaye.
		 3. Isteqbaal e Qibla- Yani namaaz me qibla ki taraf munh karna, agar qibla ki simat me shubah ho to kisi se daryaft kare. Agar koi dusra maujud na ho to ghaur o fikar ke baad jidhar dil jame usi taraf munh karke namaaz padhle. Fir agar baad namaaz malum hua ki qibla dusri simat tha to koi harz nahi namaaz ho gayi.
		 4. Waqat- Lihaza waqat se pahle namaaz padhi to na hui. 
		 5. Niyyat- Yaani dil ke pakke iradah ke sath namaaz padhna zaruri hai. Aur zubaan se niyyat ke alfaaz kah lena mustahaab hai. Isme Arabi ki takhsis nahi urdu waghairah me bhi ho sakti hai. Aur yuin kahe -niyyat ki maine... aur niyyat karta hun mai na kahe.
		 6. Takbir e Tahrima: Yaani namaaz ke suru me Allahu akbar(اللهُ اَكْبَرُ) kahna shart hai.

items.sawal: Farz aur wajib kise kahte hai?
items.jawab:
Farz wo fail(kaam) hai ki isko jaan bujh kar chhodhna Shakht gunah aur jis ibaadat ke andar wo ho baghair uske uss ke wo ibaadat durust na ho. 
		Aur wajib wo fail hai ki iss ko jaan bujh kar chodhna gunah aur namaaz me qasdan chhodhne se namaaz ka dobara padhna zaruri aur bhul kar chhut jaye to Sajdah sau lazim hai.

items.sawal: Sunnat e Muakkadah aur ghair muakkadah kise kahte hai?
items.jawab:
Sunnat e muakkadah woh fail(kaam) hai ki jiska chhodhna bura aur karna sawab hai. Aur Ittefaqan chhodhne par etaab aur chhodhne ki aadat kar lene par mustahiq e azaab. 
		Sunnat e Ghair muakkadah woh fail hai ki iss ka karna sawab aur na karna agarche a'datan ho etaab nahi magar sharyan napasand ho.

items.sawal: Mustahab aur mubah kise kahte hai?
items.jawab:
Mustahab woh fail(kaam) hai jis ka karna sawab aur na karne par kuch gunah nahi. 

		 Aur Mubah wo fail hai jiska karna na karna barabar hai.

items.sawal: Haraam aur makruh e tahrima kise kahte hai?
items.jawab:
Haraam wo fail hai ki jis ka ek baar bhi jaan bujh kar karna sakht gunah hai, aur usse bachna farz aur sawab hai. 

		Aur Makruh e tahrima woh fail hai ki jiske karne se ebaadat naaqis ho jaati hai aur karne wala gunahgar hota hai agarche uska gunah haraam se kam hai.

items.sawal: Makruh e tanzihi aur khilaf e ula kise kahte hai?
items.jawab:
Makruh e tanzihi woh fail hai ki jiska karna shariy'at ko pasand na ho, aur usse bachna bahtar aur sawab ho. 

		 Aur khilaaf e ula woh fail hai jis ka na karna behtar aur karne me koi muzaaiqah aur e'taab nahi.

items.sawal: Namaz me kitne cheeze faraiz hai?
items.jawab:
Namaz me 6 cheeze faraiz hai. - 
		 - Qyam
		 - Qiraat
		 - Ruku
		 - Sajdah
		 - Qaidah e akhirah
		 - Khuruj e bisun'ihi

[Note: Isme ek baat ghaur karna hai, dusri fiqh ki kataabo me Namaaz ki faraiz 7 bataya jati hai, jisme  Takbir e Tahrima ko bhi Shamil kia jata hai. Bahar hal dono baatei sahi hai.]

items.sawal: Qyam farz hai iska kya matlab hai?
items.jawab: Iska matlab ye hai ki khadhe ho kar namaaz ada karna zaruri hai.To kisi ne baghair uzr baith kar namaaz padhi to na hui. Khawah aurat ho ya mard. Haan nafal namaaz baith kar padhna jaiz hai.

items.sawal: Qiraat farz hai iska kya matlab hai?
items.jawab: Iska matlab ye hai ki farz ki do raka'aton mei aur witr, sunnat aur nafl ki har raka'aton mei Quran sharif padhna zaruri hai. To agar kisi ne in me Quraan na padha to namaaz na hogi.

items.sawal: Quran majid ahistah padhne ka adni darjah kya hai?
items.jawab: Ahistah padhne ka adni darjah ye hai ki khud sune agar iss qadar ahistah padha ki khud na suna to namaaz na hogi

items.sawal: Ruku' ka adna darjah kia hai?
items.jawab:
Ruku' ka adna darjah ye hai haath ghutne tak pahunch jae aur pura ruku' ye hai ki pith sidhi bichha de aur sar pith ke barabar rakhe, uncha nicha na rakhe.
[Note: Auraton ke lie ruku' ki alag huqum hai. Isko khawatin ki namaaz me dekhe.]

items.sawal: Sajdah ki haqiat kya hai?
items.jawab: Peshani zamin par jamna sajdah ki haqiqat hai. Aur paon ki ek ungli pa pet zamin se lagna shart hai yaani kam se kam paaon ki ek ungli ko modh kar qibla rokh karna zaruri hai. To agar kisine iss tarah sajdah kia ki dono paaon zamin se uthe rahe to namaaz na hui. Balki sirf ungli ki nok zamin se lagi jabbhi namaaz na hui.

items.sawal: Kitni unglion ka pet zamin se lagna wajib hai?
items.jawab: Dono paaon ki tin tin unglion zamin se lagna wajib hai.

items.sawal: Qaidah e akhirah ka kya matlab hai?
items.jawab: Namaaz ki rak'ate puri karne ke baad اتّحيّات و رَسُلُهٗ tak padhne ki miqdaar baithna farz hai

items.sawal: Khuruj e bisun'ihi kise kahte hai?
items.jawab: Qaidah e akhirah ke baad namaaz ko todh dene wala  koi kaam qasdan karne ko khuruj e bisun'ihi kahte hai. Lekin salaam ke elawah koi dusra namaaz ko todh dene wala kaam qasdan paya gaya to namaaz ka dobarah padhna wajib hai.

items.sawal: Namaaz me jo cheeze wajib hai unhe bataye.
items.jawab:
Namaaz me ye cheezen wajib hai: 
		 - Takbir e tahrima me lafze Allhu akbar(اللهُ اَكْبَرُ) ka hona. 
		 - Alhamdu padhna 
		 - Farz ki do pahli raka'ato me aur sunnat, nafl aur witr ki har rak'at me alhamdu ke sath surat ya tin chhoti aayat milanaa. 
		 - Farz namaaz me do pahli rak'aton me qiraat karna.
		 - Alhamdu ka surat se pahle hona 
		 - Har rak'at ke surat se pahle ek hi baar alhamdu padhna.
		 - Alhamdu aur surat ke darmiyan kisi ajnabi ka fasil na hona
		 - Qiraat ke baad muttasilan(fauran) ruku' karna.
		 - Sajdah me dono paaon ki tin tin unglion ka peth zamin par lagna.
		 - Dono sajdah ke darmiyan koi rukan fasil na hona.
		 - Ta'dil arkan
		 - Qauma yani ruku' se sidha khadha hona
		 - Jalsah yaani dono sajdah ke darmiyan sidha baithna. 
		  - Qa'dah ula me tashahhud ke baad kuch na pdhna
		 - Har qaidah me pura tashahhud padhna
		 - Lafz assalamu do baar kahna
		 - Witr me dua'e qunut padhna
		 - Takbir e qunut
		 - Eiden ki chhoan(6) takbire
		 - Eiden me dusri rak'at ki takbir e ruku' aur uss takbir ke lie lafz e Allahu akbar hona
		 - Har jahri namaaz me imaaam ko jahr se qiraat karna aur ghair e jahri namaaz me ahistah
		 - Har wajib aur farz ka uski jagah par hona
		 - Ruku' ka har rak'at me ek hi baar hona aur sajda ka do hi baar hona
		 - Dusri se pahli qa'dah na karna aur char rak'at wali namaaz me tisri par qa'dah na hona.
		 - Aayate sajdah padhi to sajdah tilawat karna aur sahu ho to sajdah sahu karna.
		 - Do farz ya do wajib ya wajib farz ke darmiyan tin tasbih ki miqdar waqfa na hona
		 - Imaam jab qiraat kare buland aawaj se khowah aahistah uss waqat muqtadi ka chup rahna aur siwa qiraat ke tamam wajibaat me Imaam ki mutb'at(pairwi/follow) karna.

items.sawal: Namaaz ki Sunnatei bayan farmaye?
items.jawab:
Namaaz ki Sunnatei ye hai: 
	 - Tahrima ke lie haath uthana aur haathon ki unglian apne haal par chhodh dena.
	 - Bawaqat e Takbir(Takbir karne ke time) sar na jhunkana aur hathelian aur unglian pet qibla rukh hona.
	 - Takbir se pahle haath uthana usi tarah takbir e qunut o takbiraate eiden me kaano(sirf mard k lie) tak haath le jane ke baad takbir kahna.
	 - Aurat ko sirf mundho(Kandha) tak haath uthana
	 - Imaam ka اللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ, سَمِعَ اللّٰهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهْ aur salaam buland awaaz se kahna.
	 - Baad takbir haath latkae baghair fauran bandh lena.
	 - Sana, tawwuj, tasmia padhna aur aamin kahna aur inn sab ka aahista hona, pahle sana padhna phir tawwuj phir tasmia aur har ek ke baad dusre ko fauran padhna.
	 - Ruku me tin bar سُبْحَانَ رَبِّىَ الْعَظِيْمُ kahna aur ghutno ko haathon se pakadhna aur unglian khub khuli rakhna. Aurat ko ghutne par hathr akhna aur unglian kushada(khuli) na rakhna. 
	 - Haalat e ruku' me pith khub bichhi rakhna, ruku' se uthne par haat latka hua chhodh dena. Ruku' se uthne me imaam ko سَمِعَ اللّٰهُ لِمَنْ حَمِدَهْ kahna. Muqtadi ko رَبَّنَا لَكَ الْحَمْد kahna.Aur munfarid(akela padhne wala) ko dono kahna. Sajdah ke lie aur sajdah se uthne ke lie اللّٰهُ اَكْبَرُ kahna.
	 - Sajdah me kam aj kam tin baar سُبْحَانَ رَبِّىَ الْاَعْلٰى kahna.
	 - Sajdah karne ke lie pahle ghutna phir haath phir naak phir peshani zamin par rakhna. Aur sajdah se uthne ke lie pahle peshani phir naak phir haath phir ghutna zamin se uthana.
	 - (mardo ke lie )Sajdah me baju karwaton se aur pet raanon se alag hona. Aur kutte ki tarah kalaiyaan zamin par na bichana
	 - Auraton baazu karwaton se, pet raan se, aur raan pindlian se aur pindlian zamin se mila dena.
	 - Dono sajdon ke darmian michle tashahhud ke(tashahhud ki tarah) baithna. Aur haathon ko raano par rakhna. 
	 - Sajdon me haathon ki unglian ka qibla rukh hona aur mili hui hona. Aur paaon ki dashon(10) unglian ke pet zamin par lagna yaani unglian ka qibla ki rataf modhna.
	 - Dusri rakaat ke lie panjo ke bal ghutnon par haath rakh kar uthnaa. 
	 - Qa'dah me baein(left) paon bicha kar dono surin uss par rakh kar baithna. Dahna qadam khadha rakhna aur dahne qadam ke unglian qibla rukh karna. 
 Auraton ko donon paaon dahni jaanib  nikaal kar baaein surin par bathna.
	 - Dahne haath dahne raan par aur baein(left) haath baein raan par rakhna aur unglian ko apni haalat par chhodh dena.
	 - Tashahhud par ishara karna
	 - Qaida e aakhirah me tashahhud ke baad durud sharif aur dua' e masurah padhna.

items.sawal: Agar suarah fatiha padhne ke baad surat milana bhul jae aur ruku' me yaad aye to kia kare?
items.jawab: Arat surat milaana bhul jae aur ruku' me yaad aya to khadha ho jae aur surat milae phir ruku' kare aur aakhir me sajdae sahu kare.

items.sawal: Farz ki pahli do raka'ton me surat milana bhul jae to kia kare?
items.jawab:
Farz ki pahli do raka'ton me surat milana bhul jae aur ruku' ke baad yaad aye to pichhli do raka'ton(3rd and 4th) me padhe aur sajdae sahu kare. 
	 Maghrib ki pahli do raka'ton me bhul jae to tisri me padhe aur ek raka't ki surat jaati rahi aakhir me sajde sahu kare.

items.sawal: agar farz ki pahli do raka'ton me se kisi ek me surat milana bhul jaae aur ruku' ke baad yaad ayee to kia kare?
items.jawab: Tisri ya chauthi me Surah Fatiha ke sath surat milaye aur sajdae sahu kare.

items.sawal: Agar sunnat ya nafl me surat milana bhul jae aur ruku' ke baad sajdah wagairah me yaad aae to kia kare?
items.jawab: Aakhir me sajdae sahu kare.

items.sawal: Pahli raka't me jo surat padhi phir usi surat ko dusri raka't me bhul kar shuru' kar di kia kare?
items.jawab: Phir uss surat ko shuru' kar di to usi ko padhe aur qasdan(jaan bujh kar) aisa karna makruh e tanzihi hai. Haan agar dusri surat yaad na ho to harz nahi.

items.sawal: Dusri raka't me pahli wali se upar ki surat padhi yaani pahli me قُلْ يَـٰٓاَيُّهَا الْكٰفِرُونَ aur dusri me اِنَّآ اَعْطَيْنٰكَ to kya huqum hai?
items.jawab: Dusri raka't me pahli wali se upar ki surat yaa aayat padhna makruh e tahrimi hai aur gunah hai magar bhul kar aisa ho to na gunah hai aur na sajdae sahu hai.

items.sawal: Bhul kar dusri raka't me upar ki surat shuru' kardi phir yaad aya to kya kare?
items.jawab: Jo shuru' kar chuka hai usi ko puri kare, agarche abhi ek hi huruf padha ho.

items.sawal: Pahli me اَلَمْ تَرَ كَیْفَ aur dusri me لِاِيْلٰفِ chhodh kar اَرَءَیْتَ الَّذِیْ padhna kaisa?
items.jawab: Dusri me ek chooti surat chhodh kar padhna mana' hai aur bhul kar shuru kar di to usi ki khatam kare, chhodhne ki ijaazat nahi.
